info.name: AOLMail - NoAds
info.description:
Removes the annoying ads, adjusts message list to full-width.

Hides the following elements:
* Right-side ad panel
* "Sponsored" ad at the top of the mail list
* "Today on AOL" navigation item

Suggestions or comments are welcome.
info.additionalInfo: Updated 11/21/19: Updated element name to hide "Sponsored" ad at the top of the mail list, hide "Today on AOL" navigation item.
